EmailTemplate.name: AEA 2016.AEA Reception Invite.AEA Save the Date
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at AEA 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero]]> <[[http://www.youtube.com/honeywell]]> <[[https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475]]> <[[http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Join us at AEA 2016 AEA International Convention & Trade Show April 27 - 30, 2016 in Orlando, FL We are excited to once again be a part of the Aircraft Electronics Association <[[http://aea.net/convention/2015/]]> (AEA) International Convention & Trade Show. The annual event offers a unique opportunity to connect with manufacturers, distributors, technicians and business leaders as we work together to shape the future of avionics.
During the speaking sessions, we will provide valuable information on the connected aircraft. BendixKing will be on hand as well to discuss AeroWave an in-flight Internet system for general aviation aircraft.
Attending the show? View the complete schedule <[[https://www.aea.net/convention/2016/schedule.asp]]>>
Dealer Appreciation at the MOOR Restaurant: Lounge and Rooftop Terrace. Light hors d’oeuvres and drinks will be served
Join us for an evening of cocktails and appetizers during our dealer appreciation reception. Dealer Appreciation Reception Friday, April 29 • 6 - 8:30 PM
Here's where to find us: Wednesday, April 27 8:30 - 10:30 - AeroWave Training Session - Dayton 1 & 2 9:30 - 12:00 - New Product Introductions - Main Room
7 - 10 PM - First-Nighter Party - Gaylord Palms Coquina Pavilion
Thursday, April 28
10:30 AM - 5 PM - Exhibit Hall, Booth #234
Friday, April 29 8:30 - 10:30 AM - Connected Aircraft Session - Sun 3
8:30 - 10:30 -AeroWave Training Session Tallahassee 1
10:30 AM - 5 PM - Exhibit Hall, Booth #234
6 PM - 8:30 PM
Partner Reception
The MOOR Restaurant: Lounge and Rooftop Terrace.
Light hors d’oeuvres and drinks will be served
Saturday, April 30
8:00 - 10:00 - KSN770 Training Session Gainesville 1 & 2
Gaylord Palms Resort & Convention Center <[[http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/mcogp-gaylord-palms-resort-and-convention-center/]]> 6000 West Osceola Parkway Kissimmee, Florida 34746 Privacy Statement <[[http://honeywell.com/Privacy]]> Terms & Conditions <[[http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx]]> © 2015 Honeywell International Inc. <[[http://www.honeywell.com]]>
